welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Callaway, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport serves domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. No password is required.
